name: intercession
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the act of using your influence to make someone in authority forgive someone else or save them from punishment: Several political prisoners have been released through the intercession of Amnesty International.
[ C or U ] a prayer that asks God or a god to help or cure other people
